name: mynofi-website
description: Mynofi monitoring tool marketing website - React SPA with Supabase integration

scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build && npx netlify-cli deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:prod && npx netlify-cli deploy --prod
scripts.deploy:clear: npx netlify-cli api deleteDeploys && echo 'Cleared deployment cache'
scripts.env:setup: cp .env.example .env.local && echo 'Created .env.local - please update with your Supabase credentials'
scripts.security:scan: grep -r 'ghp_\|sk-\|pk_' dist/ || echo 'âœ… Security scan passed'
scripts.netlify:status: npx netlify-cli status && npx netlify-cli env:list
scripts.deploy:fresh: npm run security:scan && npm run cache:bust && npm run deploy:status
scripts.fix:deployment: echo 'ðŸ”„ Fixing deployment issues...' && npm run cache:bust && echo 'âœ… Cache cleared, deploying fresh...'
scripts.health:check: curl -I $(npx netlify-cli status --json | jq -r '.site.url') || echo 'Site health check failed'
scripts.deployment:verify: npm run health:check && npm run security:scan && echo 'âœ… Deployment verified'

author: Mynofi Team
